author: Thomas
content:
Your initial thoughts on the SoFoMoBo project completely reflect my own. Extremly tempting, but how to squeeze in in ones everyday routines? I guess one challenge of the project was to break from that routine - and at least I have to admit defeat in that respect.

But it sounds as if you start developing a great "last exit" strategy. I'm looking forward to whatever might happen - great photos will certainly be involved ðŸ™‚
